page.title: 05Residents Concerns
page.content: The residents feel that most of the local facilities are centred towards the Village -which is some distance away- and that they are unlikely to be given many of their wishes. People felt that the lack of medical assistance close to the area caused problems and they wished that a health centre of some kind could be built in the area. Recently part of the area had its boundary changed and was tranferred from Lancashire into Merseyside. The rates increased and people in the area feel the rates are much too high for the facilities which they are given. Their grievance is born out by the fact that in our count we found there to be few shopping, sports or recreational facilities.
